channel.title: Best way to sync load balanced servers
channel.description:
I have two servers with root access (both at different locations), and the load is split between them by round robin dns.
What would be the best way to keep the files automatically synchronized on both servers?
The files don't have to be transferred both ways - one server can be a 'master' and the other can just keep checking it for new files every hour or so.
